description: Try our easy to follow Lemon & Garlic Chicken Casserole recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stew & casserole,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Low sugar,Sesame free,Mushroom,High protein,One-pot,Soy free,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Lemon & Garlic Chicken Casserole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large ovenproof casserole dish over medium heat. Lightly coat chicken with flour. Cook chicken in two batches for 8 minutes or until browned on all sides. Transfer to a large plate.

Add leek, mushrooms and garlic to casserole and cook, stirring often for 5 minutes or until soft. Pour stock and lemon juice and bring to the boil. Return drumsticks. Cover and place in oven. Cook for 1 hour.
Remove lid from casserole and stir through beans. Cover and stand for 5 minutes or until beans are tender. Serve.
